greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of prime factors of n-th semiprime.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Robert G. Wilson v, Graph of n and a(n)
formula: If A001358(n)=s*p, then in this sequence a(n)=s+p.
a(n) = A084126(n)+A084127(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 24 2006 [Typo in formula fixed by _Zak Seidov_, Aug 23 2014 ]
maple: with(numtheory): a:=proc(n) if bigomega(n)=2 and nops(factorset(n))=2 then factorset(n)[1]+factorset(n)[2] elif bigomega(n)=2 then 2*sqrt(n) else fi end: seq(a(n),n=1..214); # _Emeric Deutsch_
mathematica: f[n_] := Total[#1*#2 & @@@ FactorInteger@ n]; f@# & /@ Select[Range@300, PrimeOmega@# == 2 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 23 2013 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 27 2002
